trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Glasgow
There were no other sightings in Glasgow on or around May 12th 2013
Summary: this object didnt land there were no entities it moved silently in the clear night sky the other witnesses i didnt know strangers at two different bus stops .
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming off a local bus at 22.20 midnight i noticed people from two adjacent bus stops looking skywards i then looked up & noticed this bright yellow object moving slowly across the sky it was a clear night no clouds it had an outer red ring around it the people who had been observing it prior too me getting off my bus i reckon around 9 at two different bus stops witnessed this object they alighted there buse too get home i was left myself watching this craft or glowing object for 10 minutes it then proceeded to change its shape from circular to ovular shap it started to increase its speed the outer red ring became orange while the inner part stayed a yewllowish pulsating colour it sped off over the local hospital the royal infirmary going in an easterly direction this is true what i witnessed .my reaction was one of awe amazing it wasnt any conventional aeroplanes or chinese lanterns .when i noticed this object i knew it wasnt anything earthly that was my first thought still see it vivid in my mind . when i got home i phoned my brother of what id just witnessed .i tried too take a photo of it my phone didnt work .
